data.title: The Law Firm of Douglas G. Jackson
data.meta_description: Douglas G. Jackson, Doug, is the is the owner and founder of The Law Firm Douglas G. Jackson, P.A. Doug is a dedicated and experienced legal advocate, who has a strong passion for helping people, especially his clients, find the justice they deserve.
data.meta_site_name: The Law Firm of Douglas G. Jackson
data.text:
Douglas G. Jackson, Doug, is the is the owner and founder of The Law Firm Douglas G. Jackson, P.A. He currently serves as President, Managing Attorney, and Team Lead. Doug is a dedicated and experienced legal advocate, who has a strong passion for helping people, especially his clients, find the justice they deserve. His early career focused on helping the disabled, including disabled veterans, get the disability payments that make all the difference to their quality of life. Over the last several years, Doug has expanded his practice area to benefit even more clients.

Doug obtained his bachelorâ€™s degree from Colorado State University. He received his law degree from Stetson University College of Law. He is admitted to practice before the Florida Supreme Court, the United States Court of Appeals for Veterans Claims, the United States Middle District of Florida, accredited to practice before the United States Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) and is allowed to practice before the United States Social Security Administration (SSA).
